org.jsmsengine
Class CDeviceInfo

java.lang.Object
  org.jsmsengine.CDeviceInfo

public class CDeviceInfo
extends java.lang.Object

This class keeps information and statistics about the usage of the GSM device. Information held in this object is updated automatically from jSMSEngine API during the initial connection. From then on, its up to the programmer to call the necessary refresh function in order to get refreshed info if needed.

The class contains an object of the subclass named CStatistics, which holds counters for the traffic of SMS messages (in/out). These counters are updated automatically, when the in/out operations are performed, so they are always up to date.

See Also:
CService.refreshDeviceInfo(), CService.getDeviceInfo()

getImsi

public java.lang.String getImsi()
Returns the IMSI (International Mobile Subscriber Identity) of the device. This information depends on the device and/or the smartcard and is not always available.

Returns:
the IMSI of the device.

getSwVersion

public java.lang.String getSwVersion()
Returns the software version of the device.

Returns:
the software version of the device.

getBatteryLevel

public int getBatteryLevel()
Returns the battery level of the device. A value of 100 means fully charged battery. A value of 0 means empty battery.

Returns:
the battery level of the device.

getSignalLevel

public int getSignalLevel()
Returns the signal status of the device. A value of 100 means full signal. A value of 0 means no signal.
Note: the scale is logarithmic, not linear!

Returns:
the signal status of the device.

getStatistics

public CDeviceInfo.CStatistics getStatistics()
Returns the statistics object which keeps statistics for incoming / outgoing messages.

Returns:
a CStatistics objects.
